RTCRemoteInboundRtpStreamStatsPacketsRec.summary: The packetsReceived property of the dictionary returns the total number of {{Glossary("RTP")}} packets received from the synchronization source (SSRC) of this stream by the remote endpoint, including retransmissions.
RTCRemoteInboundRtpStreamStatsPacketsRec.value: A positive integer value indicating the total number of received RTP packets at the remote endpoint.
